mapper.insert: insert into IF_WCS_15 (TASKKY, TASKIT, TASKTY, OWNRKY, SKUKEY, LOCAFR, LOCATO, QTTAOR, QTCOMP, CREDATE, CREUSR, QTYCMP, WK_STS) values (#{taskky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownrky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locafr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locato,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qttaor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{qtcomp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{credate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creusr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qtycmp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wkSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update IF_WCS_15 set TASKTY = #{taskty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNRKY = #{ownrky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUKEY = #{skukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCAFR = #{locafr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATO = #{locato,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTTAOR = #{qttaor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, QTCOMP = #{qtcomp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREDATE = #{credate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREUSR = #{creusr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTYCMP = #{qtycmp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WK_STS = #{wkSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TASKKY = #{taskky,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TASKIT = #{taskit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select TASKKY, TASKIT, TASKTY, OWNRKY, SKUKEY, LOCAFR, LOCATO, QTTAOR, QTCOMP, CREDATE, CREUSR, QTYCMP, WK_STS from IF_WCS_15
